title: South Africa’s ‘Plan AB’ ahead of ICC World T20
text: South Africa’s ‘Plan AB’ ahead of ICC World T20 Sunday, 4 October 2015 (2 minutes ago) South Africa, ahead of the World T20, are experimenting with AB de Villiers as an opener for the shortest format. Dhoni says India ready to take on South Africa ahead of T20 opener 00:44 Dharamsala, Oct 01 (ANI): As India and South Africa kick off their first T20 match in the picturesque Dharamsala town, captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni on Thursday said that the team was in good stand.
